metadata.title: CVE-2016-9888 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An error within the "tar_directory_for_file()" function (gsf-infile-tar.c)in GNOME Structured File Library before 1.14.41 can be exploited to triggera Null pointer dereference and subsequently cause a crash via a crafted TARfile.

criterions.comment: libgsf package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
